        system:
          description: >
            Values within the device configuration that are used by HERE
            Tracking for

            various application flows.


            This object can be read by HERE Tracking whereas the content of the payload is

            opaque.


            stateVersion can be provided by the device, denoting the version of the last

            known desired state seen by the device.
          properties:
            client:
              description: |
                Information about the client Device.
              example:
                firmware: heroltexx...
                homenetwork: []
                manufacturer: Samsung
                model: SM-G930F
                name: HERE Tracker
                platform: Android
                version: 1.6.1
              properties:
                firmware:
                  description: Device firmware version information
                  maxLength: 150
                  minLength: 1
                  type: string
                homenetwork:
                  description: Information about subscriber home network - 3GPP MCC+MNC or
                    3GPP2 SID+NID. Dual-SIM devices can provide information on
                    both two subscriptions.
                  items:
                    description: Network information. Either MCC + MNC or SID + NID
                      attribute pair is required.
                    properties:
                      mcc:
                        description: Mobile Country Code
                        maximum: 999
                        minimum: 200
                        type: integer
                      mnc:
                        description: Mobile Network Code
                        maximum: 999
                        minimum: 0
                        type: integer
                      nid:
                        description: Network Id, NID
                        maximum: 65535
                        minimum: 0
                        type: integer
                      sid:
                        description: System Id, SID
                        maximum: 32767
                        minimum: 1
                        type: integer
                    type: object
                  maxItems: 2
                  type: array
                manufacturer:
                  description: Manufacturer of the device (hardware)
                  maxLength: 50
                  minLength: 2
                  type: string
                model:
                  description: Model of the device (hardware)
                  maxLength: 50
                  minLength: 1
                  type: string
                name:
                  description: Name of the client software accessing the HERE API
                  maxLength: 50
                  minLength: 3
                  type: string
                platform:
                  description: Software platform information of the device, for example
                    operating system name and version.
                  maxLength: 50
                  minLength: 3
                  type: string
                version:
                  description: Version of the client software in format X.Y.Z, where X
                    [0..255] is a major, Y [0..255] is a minor, and Z [0..65535]
                    is a build version number. Increase the version/build number
                    for each release of the client.
                  maxLength: 13
                  minLength: 3
                  type: string
              type: object
            phoneNumber:
              description: >
                The phone number of the device's SIM card in the international
                E.164 format. You should prefix all country codes with "+"
                instead of "00".
              example: "+491234567890"
              pattern: ^\+[1-9]\d{1,14}$
              type: string
            stateVersion:
              description: >
                The version of the state of a device. This should be incremented
                only by HERE Tracking.
              minimum: 0
              type: integer
          type: object
        timestamp:
          description: >
            Milliseconds elapsed since 1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC.


            This describes when the reported measurements were taken.


            If the device does not provide a timestamp, Here Tracking writes its own system time

            here at ingestion time.
          maximum: 4102448400000
          minimum: 2
          type: integer
      required:
        - timestamp
      type: object
    transition:
      additionalProperties: false
      description: >
        | Transition Type          | Meaning                                  |

        | ------------------------ | ---------------------------------------- |

        | PING_OUTSIDE_FENCE       | The device has transitioned fully outside the geofence. The accuracy circle does not intersect the geofence anywhere |

        | PING_IN_FENCE            | The device has transitioned fully inside the geofence. The accuracy circle does not intersect the geofence anywhere |

        | PING_NEAR_FENCE_BOUNDARY | The accuracy circle intersects the geofence. |
      example:
        fenceId: e2f651ee-f196-4fa3-bf88-894dc131dea3
        inOut: PING_IN_FENCE
        notificationStatus: NOT_SENT
        timestamp: 1499258057036
        trackingId: HERE-871eb4c9-76f6-4e9d-bed7-fa114f793e83
      properties:
        geofenceId:
          description: |
            Must be a valid UUIDv4.
          format: uuid
          type: string
        inOut:
          enum:
            - PING_OUTSIDE_FENCE
            - PING_IN_FENCE
            - PING_NEAR_FENCE_BOUNDARY
          type: string
        notificationStatus:
          enum:
            - SENT
            - NOT_SENT
          type: string
        timestamp:
          description: Milliseconds elapsed since 1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC.
          maximum: 4102448400000
          minimum: 2
          type: integer
        trackingId:
          description: The ID HERE Tracking assigned to the device when it was claimed by a
            user.
          type: string
      required:
        - inOut
        - geofenceId
        - trackingId
        - timestamp
        - notificationStatus
      type: object
    webhook:
      allOf:
        - additionalProperties: false
          example:
            type: webhook
            url: https://example.com/call/this/web/hook
          properties:
            type:
              description: The type of notification channel to be created
              enum:
                - webhook
              type: string
            url:
              description: >
                Required for type webhook. A URL for webhook notifications
                capable of receiving POST requests.
              type: string
          type: object
        - properties:
            definition:
              properties:
                url:
                  description: >
                    A URL for webhook notifications capable of receiving POST
                    requests
                  type: string
              type: object
          type: object
      description: A webhook notification channel properties
      type: object
